data: `minecraft:rail_sensor` defines the entity's behavior when passing over an activated or deactivated rail.

data.Name: check_block_types
data.Description: If true, on tick this entity will trigger its on_deactivate behavior

data.Name: eject_on_activate
data.Description: If true, this entity will eject all of its riders when it passes over an activated rail

data.Name: eject_on_deactivate
data.Description: If true, this entity will eject all of its riders when it passes over a deactivated rail

data.Name: on_activate
data.Description: Event to call when the rail is activated

data.Name: on_deactivate
data.Description: Event to call when the rail is deactivated

data.Name: tick_command_block_on_activate
data.Description: If true, command blocks will start ticking when passing over an activated rail

data.Name: tick_command_block_on_deactivate
data.Description: If false, command blocks will stop ticking when passing over a deactivated rail
